alert.note: Alert for Catawba; Gaston; Lincoln (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 20 at 3:19PM EDT until October 20 at 3:45PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN CATAWBA...LINCOLN AND NORTH CENTRAL GASTON COUNTIES... At 318 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 4 miles south of Newton to near Lincolnton, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Newton, Lincolnton, Maiden, Westport, High Shoals, Boger City, Iron Station, Denver, Lowesville, and Sherrills Ford. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
